awd_titl_txt: Digitizing Scopes for the Electronics Technology Laboratory
awd_abstract_narration: This project utilizes eight, four channel, wide bandwidth, digital              oscilloscopes to strengthen the digital and microprocessor                      laboratories.  This equipment allows students to perform new                    experiments with greater ease and accuracy.                                                                                                                     Freshman students gain an appreciation for the automatic setup                  measurement mode aa well as the digital readout of significant                  quantities without the need for manual calibrations and                         calculations.   This enhances motivation, retention, and learning.              Other students are able to perform experiments and demonstrate                  important principles that could not previously be accomplished.                                                                                                 The award is being matched by an equal amount from the principal                investigator's institution.

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: RESEARCH FOUNDATION OF THE CITY UNIVERSITY OF NEW YORK
